titles.title: Gyakuten Saiban: Sono "Shinjitsu", Igi Ari! Season 2
Ace Attorney S2
逆転裁判~その「真実」, 異議あり!~ Season 2
Ace Attorney Season 2
역전재판 2
逆轉裁判 第二季
逆转裁判 第二季

externalentity.identifier: 逆転裁判_〜その「真実」、異議あり!〜

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

episode.title: 失われた逆転
The Lost Turnabout
Ushinawareta Gyakuten
episode.summary: Our ace attorney finds himself unconscious in the courthouse lobby, and he`s unable to recall anything! How will he save his client? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 盗まれた逆転 - 1st Trial
The Stolen Turnabout: 1st Trial
Nusumareta Gyakuten: 1st Trial
episode.summary: A Kurain Village treasure exhibit is set to be held at the Lordly Tailor, the biggest department store in the city. But the sacred urn is stolen by none other than Mask DeMasque, renowned phantom thief! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 盗まれた逆転 - 2nd Trial
The Stolen Turnabout: 2nd Trial
Nusumareta Gyakuten: 2nd Trial
episode.summary: The trial of Mask DeMasque for stealing the Kurain urn begins, with plenty of twists and turns in the tale! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 盗まれた逆転 - 3rd Trial
The Stolen Turnabout: 3rd Trial
Nusumareta Gyakuten: 3rd Trial
episode.summary: The client was at the scene of a murder when it happened, and our Ace Attorney was the one who proved that in court! How can he get out of this mess? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 盗まれた逆転 - Last Trial
The Stolen Turnabout: Last Trial
Nusumareta Gyakuten: Last Trial
episode.summary: With the murder trial beginning, our ace attorney must unravel the elaborate scheme surrounding the two incidents that occurred simultaneously and unmask the true killer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 届け逆転のメロディ
Sound the Turnabout Melody
Todoke Gyakuten no Melody
episode.summary: Hearing the radio at a restaurant brings back memories of when it helped connect two distant friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転のレシピ - 1st Trial
Recipe for Turnabout: 1st Trial
Gyakuten no Recipe: 1st Trial
episode.summary: Hearing the radio at a restaurant brings back memories of when it helped connect two distant friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転のレシピ - Last Trial
Recipe for Turnabout: Last Trial
Gyakuten no Recipe: Last Trial
逆転特急, 北へ - 1st Trial
Northward, Turnabout Express: 1st Trial
Gyakuten Tokkyuu, Kita e: 1st Trial
episode.summary: A dream train ride takes a drastic turn when it`s hijacked by a fugitive demanding a retrial. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転特急, 北へ - 2nd Trial
Northward, Turnabout Express: 2nd Trial
Gyakuten Tokkyuu, Kita e: 2nd Trial
episode.summary: The trial is underway, and the evidence mounts against the defendant, but it is interrupted by a blood-curdling scream and the discovery of a corpse. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転特急, 北へ - Last Trial
Northward, Turnabout Express: Last Trial
Gyakuten Tokkyuu, Kita e: Last Trial
episode.summary: The case rumbles towards its climax, as more details emerge about the case a year ago, and the truth is revealed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 思い出の逆転
Turnabout Memories
Omoide no Gyakuten
episode.summary: Five years ago, our ace attorney found himself in court under very different circumstances. And unbeknownst to him, these memories are the key to overcoming the trials and tribulations he will soon come to face. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転の潮騒が聞こえる
Hear the Waves of Turnabout
Gyakuten no Shiosai ga Kikoeru
episode.summary: Our ace attorney gets a surprise visit from his little friend, who comes with the request of a lifetime. She wants him to accompany her to a certain beach, which is the only place a very special kind of seashell can be found. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 始まりの逆転 - 1st Trial
Turnabout Beginnings: 1st Trial
Hajimari no Gyakuten: 1st Trial
episode.summary: The clock rewinds to six years ago, to the first-ever case our ace attorney`s mentor handled. Her client: a death row inmate on the hook for murdering a policewoman during his escape attempt. She quickly learns that there`s more to this case than meets the eye. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 始まりの逆転 - Last Trial
Turnabout Beginnings: Last Trial
Hajimari no Gyakuten: Last Trial
episode.summary: As the pivotal case from six years ago headed toward its climax, the truth seemed to be well within reach... But there was to be one last twist in the tale. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - 1st Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: 1st Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: 1st Trial
episode.summary: Back in the present, our spirit medium decides to hit up Hazakura Temple, a renowned training spot, to boost her powers. There, the gang runs into some familiar faces, some unforgettable. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - 2nd Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: 2nd Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: 2nd Trial
episode.summary: Genius prosecutor-turned-temporary defense attorney takes the court to defend a client at his best friend`s request, but the prosecution`s case is strong. Can he turn things about? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - 3rd Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: 3rd Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: 3rd Trial
episode.summary: The self-proclaimed genius apprentice artist takes the witness stand to testify about the "crazy" events he saw unfold. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - 4th Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: 4th Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: 4th Trial
episode.summary: Our ace attorney is back in action, and he visits Hazakura Temple to get a better understanding of what really happened. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - 5th Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: 5th Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: 5th Trial
episode.summary: With the terrifying assassination plot uncovered, our ace attorney returns to court once again, only to be confronted by a baffling testimony. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - 6th Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: 6th Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: 6th Trial
episode.summary: The switcheroo has been revealed, and now the ghosts of the past must be laid to rest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華麗なる逆転 - Last Trial
Bridge to the Turnabout: Last Trial
Karei naru Gyakuten: Last Trial
episode.summary: The ghosts of the past have been laid to rest, but the case has yet to be fully solved. The tragic truth must come to light, no matter what the cost. Source: crunchyroll
